amendment.description: To address the duration of certain consumer elections and to define the term "pre-existing business relationship".

vote.text: Amendment SA 2060 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2060 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S13877-13878; text: CR S13877) To address the duration of certain consumer elections and to define the term "pre-existing business relationship".
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2060 proposed by Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2060 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
